name: LinkTasksClickup
description:
Link two ClickUp tasks together.

This tool allows you to link two tasks in ClickUp via the Task Links feature in the right-hand sidebar of a task. It should be called when you need to associate tasks directly, but does not support linking to other types of objects.

parameters.name: source_task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task from which the link will be initiated.

value_schema.description: The task to initiate the link from.

parameters.name: task_to_link_to
parameters.description: The ID of the task to link to the initiating task.

parameters.name: workspace_id_for_custom_task
parameters.description: Provide the Workspace ID if referencing a task by custom task id (when custom_task_ids is true).

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.
 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: use_custom_task_ids
parameters.description: Set to true to reference a task by its custom task ID.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by it's custom task id, this value must be `true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.
